CustomField.formula: IF(OR(ISPICKVAL( SOPs__c , "N/A"),ISPICKVAL( SOPs__c , "YES")),0.15,0)+ IF(OR(ISPICKVAL( Correct_Answer__c , "N/A"),ISPICKVAL( Correct_Answer__c , "YES")),0.10,0)+ IF(OR(ISPICKVAL( Request_Completed__c , "N/A"),ISPICKVAL( Request_Completed__c , "YES")),0.05,0)+ IF(OR(ISPICKVAL( Email_Templates__c , "N/A"),ISPICKVAL( Email_Templates__c , "YES")),0.05,0)+ IF(OR(ISPICKVAL( Successful_Send_Off__c , "N/A"),ISPICKVAL( Successful_Send_Off__c , "YES")),0.05,0)+ IF(OR(ISPICKVAL( Comprehensive_Notes_Included__c , "N/A"),ISPICKVAL( Comprehensive_Notes_Included__c , "YES")),0.05,0)+ IF(OR(ISPICKVAL( Asked_for_Review__c , "N/A"),ISPICKVAL( Asked_for_Review__c , "YES")),0.05,0)+ IF(OR(ISPICKVAL( Questioning_Skills__c , "N/A"),ISPICKVAL( Questioning_Skills__c , "YES")),0.05,0)+ IF(OR(ISPICKVAL( Jargon__c , "N/A"),ISPICKVAL( Jargon__c , "YES")),0.05,0)+ IF(OR(ISPICKVAL( Language__c , "N/A"),ISPICKVAL( Language__c , "YES")),0.05,0)+ IF(OR(ISPICKVAL( Related_Records_Linked__c , "N/A"),ISPICKVAL( Related_Records_Linked__c , "YES")),0.05,0)+ IF(OR(ISPICKVAL( Customer_Authentication__c , "N/A"),ISPICKVAL( Customer_Authentication__c , "YES")),0.10,0)+ IF(OR(ISPICKVAL( Value_Added__c , "N/A"),ISPICKVAL( Value_Added__c , "YES")),0.05,0)+ IF(OR(ISPICKVAL( Grammar__c , "N/A"),ISPICKVAL( Grammar__c , "YES")),0.05,0)+ IF(OR(ISPICKVAL( Closure_SLA__c , "N/A"),ISPICKVAL( Closure_SLA__c , "YES")),0.10,0)
